snippet: Environmentally conscious investors are using their pocketbooks to protest President Donald Trump's plans to slash environmental regulations, fueling a rally in funds that only invest in companies that meet progressive criteria for sustainability....

headline.main: Sessions to Respond in Writing to Questions Over Russia Contacts: DOJ
headline.print_headline: Sessions to Respond in Writing to Questions Over Russia Contacts: DOJ

lead_paragraph: Environmentally conscious investors are using their pocketbooks to protest President Donald Trump's plans to slash environmental regulations, fueling a rally in funds that only invest in companies that meet progressive criteria for sustainability.
